response.overview: The Equinox is an incantation, a rupture in the fabric of perception where narrative dissolves, leaving only the vestigial echoes of meaning. It does not unfold so much as it unravels, a celluloid s√©ance in which time and identity fracture, revealing the abyss beneath our fragile constructs of reality.
response.tagline: It is inescapable, unfathomable, a specter beyond comprehension, to which one may only bear witness.
response.title: Equinox
